long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zen - A Peaceful Web Experience

Zen transforms your browsing experience into a DISTRACTION FREE joy by giving you control over Notifications and Black-listing sites*

-NO more annoying pop-ups asking you if you want to receive notifications

Take back control with Zen.

*Black-listing sites is a feature still in development and is not present in the current version of the extension
